entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Showers beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 16.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 late in the afternoon. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
